incidents.description:
"3 blue SUVs and 1 white truck parked at Trinity Community Apartments. 6 border patrol agents wearing plain clothes, tactical vests and face coverings detained 2 men, one was not wearing a shirt. Colectiva Comunidad also posted ICE presence verified at Trinity Community Apartments.
1 person being detained in jeans and brown shirt. 3 Charlotte fire (or ems) on scene."
Comunidad Colectiva posted they verified ICE presence at Atrium Health Main Campus.
